Tour du Rwanda Kigali - Rwamagana

Etape: Kigali - Rwamagana - Kigali
Km: 111.8
Isaha yo guhaguruka: 10:00

Umwanditsi : Ngabo Roben na Ishimwe Israel

Abegukanye ibihembo

Umwenda w'urusha abandi guhangana utangwa na Rwanda Tea: Mugisha Moise (Team Rwanda)

Umwenda w'umunyarwanda waje hafi utangwa na RDB: Areruya Joseph (Delko Marseille Provence)

Umunyarwanda waje hafi ni Areruya Joseph

Areruya Joseph usanzwe ari umuhanga muri Sprint asoreje ku mwanya wa kane akoresheje amasaha 2h41'36''

13:09

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Fedeli Alessandro ni muntu ki?

Fedeli Alessandro Fedeli Alessandro wegukanye agace k'uyu munsi yavutse tariki 2 Werurwe 1996, avukira mu Mujyi Negrar mu Butaliyani. Mu 2015 nibwo yitabiriye isiganwa mpuzamahanga ku nshuro ya mbere, ari kumwe n'ikipe itarabigize umwuga yitwa General Store Bottoli Zardini. Yayikiniye kugera mu 2016 ubwo yasinyaga amasezerano y'umwaka umwe muri Unieuro–Wilier. Nyuma yawo yahise yerekeza muri Delko–Marseille Provence yabanje gukoramo igeragezwa kuva mu 2017

13:03

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Igifashije Fedeli Alessandro gutsinda agace ka mbere

Amakipe afite abakinnyi biyizera kuri Sprint yakoze cyane. Ariko bamwe muri barimo na Ávila Edwin wa Israel Cycling Academy bakora impanuka muri metero 50 uvuye ku murongo biha amahirwe Fedeli Alessandro wari inyuma yabo atsinda bitamugoye

12:56

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

AGACE KA MBERE KEGUKANYWE N'UMUTALIYANI Fedeli Alessandro

Kuri sprint ikomeye, Umutaliyani Fedeli Alessandro ukinira Delko Marseille Provence yo mu Bufaransa, ukinana na Areruya Joseph niwe wegukanye agace ka mbere ka Tour du Rwanda 2019.

12:49

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Urugamba rukomeye mu bilometero bya nyuma

Bari kwihutisha igare cyane mu muhanda Sonatubes, Rwandex, mu Gatenga mbere yo gusoreza imbere ya IPRC Kigali, Kicukiro Centre

12:46

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Igikundi gifashe abari imbere

Abakinnyi bane bageze i Kigali bari imbere ariko bamanuka Sonatubes igikundi kirabafata. Bageze Kicukiro Centre igikundi cyose kinyongera hamwe. Umukinnyi uyoboye itsinda rishyikiriye abari biriwe imbere ni Rodrigo Contreras Pinzón w'imyaka 25 ukinira Astana Pro Team uri mu bahabwa amahirwe yo kwegukana iri siganwa

12:27

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Umunota umwe niwo kinyuranyo hagati y'igikundi n'abari imbere

Abakinnyi bane bacomotse mu gikundi isiganwa rigitangira, Bonaventure Uwizeyimana ukinira Team Benediction Club n' Umufaransa Hudry Florian, Rohan Du Plooy wa Pro Touch yo muri Afurika y'epfo na Mugisha Moise wa Team Rwanda. Igikundi kibari inyuma hasigayemo intera y'umunota umwe.Abasiganwa barenze ku Murindi bagiyekugera aho bita 12.

12:16

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Uko isiganwa risatira umusozo niko umuvuduko w'igikundi wiyongera

Abari imbere barenze i Rugende barasatira i Kabuga. Igikundi kibari inyuma baragisiga umunota n;amasegonda 41. Gusa umuvuduko wiyongereye cyane kuko ubu baragendera ku muvuduko wa 41Km/h

12:12

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Bidasubirwaho umwenda wa Cogebanque uhabwa urusha abandi kuzamuka uregukanwa na Rohan Du Plooy

Umukinnyi w'umunya-Afurika y'epfo Rohan Du Plooy wavutse tariki 14 Nzeri mu 1994 niwe wegukanye amanota inshuro ebyiri mu musozi rukumbi wa Ntunga uri muri uyu muhanda. Bivuga ko igihembo cy'umukinnyi urusha abandi kuzamuka gitangwa na Banki ya Cogebanque kiza kwegukanwa nawe.

11:57

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Amanota yo mu musozi yongeye gutaha muri Afurika y'epfo

Rohan Du Plooy ukinira Pro Touch yo muri Afurika y'epfo niwe uminutse umusozi wa Ntunga ari imbere. Akurikiwe na Mugisha Moise wa Team Rwanda naho Hudry Florian aza ku mwanya wa gatatu.

11:50

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Mugisha Samuel aratuje mu gikundi

Ikipe ya Dimension Data ya Mugisha Samuel wegukanye Tour du Rwanda y'umwaka ushize ntabwo iri kugerageza gusatira. Iratuje mu gikundi. Bategereje uduce tw'imisozi. Kubera imbeho, bari gukina bifubitse

11:48

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Igikundi gikomeje kugabanya ikinyuranyo

Abasiganwa basohotse mu Mujyi wa Rwamagana. Barasatira umusozi wa Ntunga aho babarira amanota yo kuzamuka ku nshuro ya kabiri. Iinyuranyo hagati y'igikundi n'abakinnyi bane bari imbere ubu ni iminota itatu n'amasegonda atanu

11:26

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Igikundi kiri gukoresha imbaraga nyinshi

Nyuma yo kubona ko abakinnyi bane bari imbere bari kwihuta cyane, igikundi nacyo gitangiye gukoresha imbaraga nyinshi. Ubu intera iri hagati ni iminota ine n'amasegonda 54.

Abayoboye igikundi ni abakinnyi ba Israel Cycling Academy; Gebremedin Awet, Badilatti Matteo, Goldstein Omer na Turek Daniel

11:19

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Isiganwa riri kwihuta bidasanzwe

Kuko ari mu mirambi isiganwa riri kwihuta. Ubu abari imbere bari gukoresha umuvuduko wa kilometero 39 ku isaha

11:16

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Abari imbere binjiye i Rwamagana

Abafana bari mu Mujyi wa Rwamagana bakirije amashyi abakinnyi bane bacomotse mu gikundi bamaze kugera aha hahoze hitwa mu Buganza. Mugisha Moise wa TeaM Rwanda niwe uri imbere

11:12

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Amanota yo mu musozi wa mbere yegukanywe n'umunya-Afurika y'epfo

Abacomotse mu gikundi baminutse umusozi wa Ntunga. Umunya-Afurika y'epfo ukinira Pro-Touch Cycling Team, Rohan Du Plooy w'imyaka 25 niwe wegukanye amanota ya mbere yo mu musozi ya Tour du Rwanda 2019. Aminutse Ntunga ari imbere, akurikiwe na Hudry Florian ukinira Interpro Cycling Academy yo mu Buyapani, naho Mugisha Moise ari inyuma yabo gato

11:06

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Ntunga- Mugisha Moise yacomotse mu gikundi ari gusatira abari imbere

Abakinnyi bari guterera umusozi wa Ntunga uza gutangirwaho amanota y'ahazamuka. Mugisha Moise w'imyaka 20 ukinira Team Rwanda yacomotse mu gikundi ari gusatira Uwizeyimana na n'Umufaransa Hudry Florian uri imbere. Barahatanira kuza gutangirana isiganwa umwenda w'urusha abandi guterera imisozi

10:57

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Bonaventure Uwizeyimana akomeje kongera ibihe asiga igikundi

Abakinnyi bacomotse mu gikundi bari gukoresha imbaraga nyinshi. Barenze Bushenyi. Bari hafi gusatira Rwamagana. Umujyi ubamo ikipe y'amagare ya Les Amis Sportifs iterwa inkunga na Banki ya Cogebaque.

Ubu Bona na Hudry Florian bamaze gusiga igikundi iminota 5'35''

10:54

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Mu Kabuga ka Musha Igikundi kiratuje

Abakinnyi bari mu gikundi baragendara hamwe baratuje nta gucomoka mu gikundi kwinshi kuri kuranga uyu munsi wa mbere w'isiganwa. Birashya bishyira kugerera ku murongo rimwe ari benshi bigaha amahirwe abakinnyi bazi 'sprint' barimo abanyarwanda; Bonaventure Uwizeyimana wa Benedictio Excell Club y'i Rubavu na Areruya Joseph wa Delko Maeseille Province. Gusa hano hari kabuhariwe wa Sprint, Umufaransa Yohann Gène ukinira Direct Énergie wakinnye Tour de France inshuro eshatu

10:40

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Ikirere cya Rwamagana kiratanga icyizere

Mu gihe abasiganwa bahagurutse i Kigali ikirere kijimye kandi cyatanze imvura mu masaha ya mu Gitondo, aho berekeza mu karere ka Rwamagana ho ikirere kirakeye hari umucyo

10:38

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Abakinnyi babiri ba Team Rwanda bavuka i Rwamagana bategerejwe iwabo

Mu muhanda ujya i Rwamagana hari benshi bategereje abakinnyi babiri bahavuka bakinira Team Rwanda; Valens Ndayisenga wegukanye Tour du Rwanda ebyiri 2014 na 2016 na Jean Claude Uwizeye wabaye uwa kabiri muri Tour du Rwanda ishize

10:33

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Rugende- Abafana ni benshi

Nkuko bisanzwe, abafana b'umukino wo gusiganwa ku magare ni benshi ku mihanda. Urenze i Kabuga ugana i Rugende hari abaturage baje kwirebera umukino wabo

10:26

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Kabuga- Uwizeyimana Bonaventure acomotse mu gikundi

Umunyarwanda Bonaventure Uwizeyimana ukinira Team Benediction Club n' Umufaransa Hudry Florian bacomotse mu gikundi. Ubu bagisize umunota umwe n'amasegonda ane.

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Ibihe bitangiye kubarwa

Uguhanganira amadolari ibihumbi 4000 azahembwa uzegukana umwenda w'umuhondo wa Tour du Rwanda 2019 kuratangiye kuko ubu abasiganwa batangiye kubarirwa ibihe. Ni abasiganwa bavuye mu makipe atandukanye arimo Ikipe y’Igihugu y’u Rwanda, Ikipe y’Igihugu ya Érythrée, Ikipe y’Igihugu ya Kenya , Ikipe y’Igihugu ya Cameroun, Ikipe y’Igihugu y’u Bufaransa y’Abatarengeje imyaka 23, Ikipe y’Igihugu ya Algérie, Direct Énergie (u Bufaransa), Team Novo Nordisk (Amerika), Delko Marseille Provence KTM (u Bufaransa), Astana Pro Team (Astana, Kazakhstan), Benediction Continental Team (Rwanda), Bai Sicasal- Petro de Luanda (Angola), Pro Touch Team (Afurika y’Epfo), Interpro Stradalli Cycling (u Buyapani) na Dimension Data for Qhubeka (u Butaliyani)

10:24

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Aho warebera iri siganwa


Usibye gukurikira kuri IGIHE.com, Televiziyo 15 zirimo izizerekana ibilometero bya nyuma bya buri gace k’iri siganwa imbonankubone n’izizanyuzaho ikiganiro cyerekana uko umunsi w’isiganwa wagenze ryamaze kurangira nizo zahawe uburenganzira bwo gukurikirana iri siganwa.

Televiziyo zikomeye ziri mu Rwanda harimo umunani zemerewe kwerekana iri siganwa ku mugabane w’u Burayi gusa zirimo Canal+ yo mu Bufaransa, Rai Italia yo mu Butaliyani, Movistar TV yo muri Espagne, RTBF TV, VTM TV, VRT TV zo mu Bubiligi, TV2 ikorera muri Danemark na Norvège, na Sky News TV yo mu Bwongereza.

Muri Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika no muri Canada, Tour du Rwanda izakurikirwa kuri NBC News. Mu gihe abatuye umugabane wa Afurika bazahanga amaso SuperSport na Canal+.

10:10

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Abahabwa amahirwe ni abakinnyi bazi 'sprint'

Umunsi wa mbere w'iri siganwa ntabwo urimo imisozi myinshi, ni imirambi ya Gasabo na Rwamagana. Abakinnyi bafite ubuhanga mu gutambika mu kwihutisha igare cyane imbere y'umurongo wo gusorezaho ibyo bita Sprint nibo bahabwa amahirwe yo kwegukana aka gace ka mbere.

10:05

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Abasiganwa barahagurutse ariko ntabwo ibihe biratangira kubarwa

Umuvuduko ntabwo ari mwinshi kuko ibihe biratangira kubarwa (départ réel) bageze ku muhanda ujya mu gace kahariwe inganda i Masoro

10:01

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Nta munyarwanda uri mu bakinnyi 10 bahabwa amahirwe

Impuzamashyirahamwe y’umukino wo gusiganwa ku magare iha amanota abakinnyi b’uyu mukino kuri buri masiganwa mpuzamahanga bakinnye ikabatondeka ku rutonde rw’isi.

Mu bakinnyi 84 bazitabira Tour du Rwanda 2019, nta munyarwanda uri mu bakinnyi 10 ba mbere mu bafite amanota menshi ku rutonde rwa UCI rw’abahagaze neza kurusha abandi.

Umunya- Estonia Rein Taaramäe ukinira Direct Energie ufite amanota 313 niwe uhabwa amahirwe yo kwegukana Tour du Rwanda, hagendewe ku manota atangwa na UCI. Akurikiwe n’Umunya-Colombia, Hernán Ricardo Aguirre Calpa ukinira Interpro Cycling Academy ufite amanota 269.

Umunyarwanda uza hafi ni Didier Munyaneza uri ku mwanya wa 13 ufite amanota 84, Areruya Joseph ari ku mwanya wa 15 n’amanota 59 naho Mugisha Samuel wegukanye Tour du Rwanda ishize ari ku mwanya wa 19 mu bahabwa amahirwe kuko afite amanota 46 ku rutonde rwa UCI.

Soma hano inkuru bifitanye isano: https://www.igihe.com/imikino/amagare/article/ibintu-10-wamenya-kuri-tour-du-rwanda-2019-ibura-amasaha-make-ngo-itangire

09:59

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Isiganwa riratangiye

Minisitiri w'Umuco na Siporo, Nyirasafari Esperence, niwe utangije Tour du Rwanda 2019, ari kumwe n'Umuyobozi w'Ishyirahamwe ry'imikino yo gusiganwa ku magare Ferwacy, Bayingana Aimable

09:52

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Amakipe yitegura guhangana yageze aho isiganwa rigiye gutangirizwa

Abakinnyi b'amakipe yose bamaze kugera kuri Stade Amahoro ahagiye gutangirizwa iri siganwa imbere y'igicumbi cy'intwari

09:44

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Umutoza wa Team Rwanda afitiye icyizere abakinnyi be

Mu gihe habura iminota mike ngo agace ka mbere ka Tour du Rwanda gatangire, umutoza w'ikipe y'igihugu y'u Rwanda, Umunya-Amerika Sterling Magnell afitiye icyizere abakinnyi be. Yemereje IGIHE ko kwegukana agace mu isiganwa ry'uyu mwaka bishoboka.

Sterling yagize ati "Ntabwo ari akazi koroshye ariko abakinnyi banjye barimo abafite ubunararibonye kandi bamenyereye imihanda. Tugiye guhangana n'amakipe akomeye ariko twihagazeho natwe. Icyizere cyo kwegukana kamwe mu duce tuzakina kirahari kandi n'umwenda w'umuhondo birashoboka gusa birasaba kwitwara neza muri iyi minsi ya mbere y'isiganwa."

09:25

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Skol yifashishije ikipe y’amagare mu kwamamaza ibikorwa byayo

Uruganda rwa Skol ni undi muterankunga w’iri siganwa. Aho iri siganwa rigiye gutangirira hari abasore bakinira ikipe y’umukino w’amagare y’uru ruganda yitwa Skol fly Cycling Club. Nibo bari kwifashishwa mu bikorwa byo kwamamaza

09:09

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Polisi y’u Rwanda yijeje umutekano usesuye


Abapolisi bamaze kugera i Remera aho iri siganwa rigiye gutangira. Abakurikira iri siganwa basabwe guhagarara ku nkengero z’umuhanda birinda ikintu cyose gishobora gutera impanuka

09:06

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Imiterere y’umunsi wa mbere wa Tour du Rwanda 2019

Agace ka mbere ka Tour du Rwanda 2019 karimo umusozi umwe utangirwaho amanota y’abahatanira umwenda w’abarusha abandi kuzamuka imisozi, inshuro ebyiri.

Ni umusozi wa Ntunga wo mu Karere ka Rwamagana abasiganwa bajya i Rwamagana baza kuzamuka bagera ku gasongero kawo bagahabwa amanota, bakaza kongera kuwuzamuka bava i Rwamagana bagaruka i Kigali bakongerwa andi manota.

Umukinnyi witwara neza muri uyu musozi arahembwa umwenda w’urusha abandi kuzamuka, ‘meilleur grimpeur’, umwenda utangwa na Cogebanque.

09:02

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Cogebanque, umuterankunga w’iri rushanwa yaserukanye gahunda yitwa ‘AGUKA’


Mu rwego rwo gukomeza gutanga umusanzu muri gahunda ya guverinoma igamije korohereza bose kugera kuri serivisi z’imari, Banki Nyarwanda y’Ubucuruzi, Cogebanque, yegereje serivisi zo kuzigama abazakurikirana ‘Tour du Rwanda’.


Mu gihe iri rushanwa rizaba riba, Cogebanque iri mu baterankunga bakuru baryo, yiyemeje kudatuma ibyishimo by’Abanyarwanda bigarukira ku gukurikirana amasiganwa gusa, ibashyiriraho uburyo bworoshye butuma babasha gutegura ejo.

Abazajya kureba Tour du Rwanda bashobora kunyura ku muntu uhagarariye Cogebanque (agent), bakaba bafungurirwa konti ya ‘ITEZIMBERE’.

Umwihariko wa konti ya ‘ITEZIMBERE’, ni uko nta mufuragiro wa buri kwezi ucibwa, kandi ushobora kuyikoresha mu kwaka servisi zose za banki.

Gufungurirwa iyi konti bisaba kwitwaza fotokopi y’indangamuntu, ifoto imwe ngufi n’amafaranga byibura 2000Frw yo guhita ushyiraho.

Konti yo kuzigama ya ‘TEGANYA’, ishobora gufungurwa n’umukiliya mushya cyangwa usanzwe, akajya yungukirwa kugera kuri 5% by’amafaranga yabikijeho.

Uretse izi konti zombi kandi abakiliya bashobora gukomeza koroherwa no kubona serivisi zose za Cogebanque banyuze ku ba ‘Agents’ cyangwa bagakoresha ikoranabuhanga ririmo Mobile Banking, Internet Banking n’ amakarita ya MasterCard.
Muri Tour du Rwanda 2019, Cogebanque niyo izajya iha umwenda umukinnyi uzaba uwa mbere mu guterera imisozi.

08:54

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Bagiye gusoreza Kicukiro Centre ku nshuro ya mbere

Mu mateka ya Tour du Rwanda kuva yaba mpuzamahanga mu 2009, ni inshuro ya mbere abasiganwa bagiye gusoreza ku Kicukiro. Ni agace kari gasanzwe gakoreshwa nk’aho gutangirira (départ).

08:53

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Abasiganwa badafite imbaraga zihagije bashobora gusezererwa uyu munsi

Agace ka mbere ka Tour du Rwanda 2019 karimo umutego. Abasiganwa nibagaruka bavuye i Rwamagana barahingukira mu Giporoso ho mu Murenge wa Remera mu Karere ka Gasabo, bafate umuhanda ujya Kicukiro banyuze mu ihuriro ry’imihanda rya ‘Sonatubes’.

Nibagera Kicukiro Centre barakomeza inzira ijya Rwandex unyuze mu Gatenga no kuri Zion Temple kwa Gitwaza, bongere bazamuke umuhanda ujya Sonatube basoreze Kicukiro Centre.

Kuko hajemo kuzenguruka aka gace ko mu Karere ka Kicukiro mu buryo bwa ‘circuit’, umukinnyi uri imbere nazenguruka ibyo bice agasubira Sonatubes hari abakiri mu muhanda uva i Rwamagana barahita basezererwa mu isiganwa burundu nkuko amategeko abiteganya.

08:46

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Imvura yaramukiye ku muryango i Kigali


Mu bice bitandukanye bya Kigali, haramutse hagwa imvura ku buryo byatumye n’abaza kureba iri siganwa batinya kunyagirwa. Aho abanyonzi baza guhagurukira hamaze kugera abantu bake nabo bugamye imvura

08:44

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Umunsi wa mbere wa Tour du Rwanda 2019 : Kigali - Rwamagana – Kigali, ku ntera ya 111.8Km

Agace ka mbere k’iri siganwa kagiye guhaguruka kuri Stade Amahoro i Remera mukanya saa 10:00.

Abasiganwa barahaguruka (départ fictif) berekeze inzira inyura ku Giporoso n'i Nyandungu hanyuma ibihe bitangire kubarwa (départ réel) bageze mu gace kahariwe inganda i Masoro, bamanuke berekeza aho bita kuri 12 no ku Murindi bafate umuhanda werekeza i Kabuga.

Nibagera i Kabuga barakomeza umuhanda ujya i Rwamagana bakatire kuri Avega East Hostel bagaruke i Kigali basoreze ku marembo ya IPRC Kigali, Kicukiro Centre.

08:42

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Abagiye gutangira isiganwa

Abasiganwa bagiye gutangira Tour du Rwanda 2019 ni 83 bavuye mu makipe 17.

U Bufaransa nibwo buzaba bufite abakinnyi benshi (13) bazaseruka mu makipe atandukanye nka Direct Energie, Delko Marseille Provence n’Ikipe y’Igihugu y’u Bufaransa y’abatarengeje imyaka 23.

U Rwanda nirwo rukurikira u Bufaransa mu kugira abakinnyi benshi kuko ruzaba rufite 12 bazakinira amakipe abiri yo mu Rwanda; 10 bazakinira Team Rwanda na Benediction Excel Energy Club, umwe uzakinira Dimension Data n’undi uzakinira Delko Marseille Provence.

Ibihugu bya Afurika y’Epfo na Érythrée muri Tour du Rwanda 2019 bizaba bifite abakinnyi batandatu buri kimwe, bakina mu makipe atandukanye.

08:37

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Ikipe y’igihugu ya Ethiopie yasezeye mu isiganwa


Ubuyobozi bw’ishyirahamwe ry’umukino wo gusiganwa ku magare muri Ethiopia bwamenyesheje abategura Tour du Rwanda ku munota wa nyuma ko ikipe yabo y’igihugu itakitabiriye isiganwa rizenguruka u Rwanda uyu mwaka.

Byakozwe mu rwego rwo kwitegura neza shampiyona ya Afuruka izabera iwabo i Addis Abeba muri Werurwe ariko ntabwo amatariki izakinirwaho aratangazwa.

Kuva mu 2010 ni inshuro ya mbere Tour du Rwanda igiye gukinwa idafite ikipe y’igihugu ya Ethiopie kuko kuva iri siganwa ryaba mpuzamahanga, yasibye isiganwa rya 2009 gusa, byatumaga kapiteni w’iyi kipe y’igihugu, Buru Temesgen aza mu mateka y’abamaze kwitabira Tour du Rwanda nyinshi (inshuro eshanu aho aza ku mwanya wa gatandatu mu bamaze kwitabira inshuro nyinshi).

08:36

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

Isiganwa ryavuye kuri 2.2 rijya kuri 2.1

Ni inshuro ya mbere iri siganwa rigiye kuba riri ku cyiciro cya 2.1 kuko inshuro 10 zaribanjirije ryari ku cyiciro cya 2.2.
Itandukaniro ry’ibi byiciro byombi riba ko mu isiganwa riri kuri 2.1, amakipe yemerewe gutumirwamo arimo ayo mu cyiciro cya mbere ‘World Tour’ atarenze 50% y’amakipe yose agize isiganwa, n’amakipe yo mu cyiciro cya kabiri ‘Pro-Continental teams’, naho isiganwa riri ku cyiciro cya 2.2 ryo amakipe yemerewe gutumirwa ni ayo mu cyiciro cya gatatu gusa bita ‘Continental teams’ n’amakipe y’ibihugu yo ku mugabane irushanwa ryabereyeho.

08:33

Ku cyumweru, 24.02.2019

IGIHE ibahaye ikaze muri Tour du Rwanda 2019


Murakaza neza mu Cyumweru cy’ibirori by’umukino wo gusiganwa ku magare mu Rwanda. Tubakiriye mu minsi umunani yo kuryoherwa n’isiganwa mpuzamahanga rizenguruka u Rwanda ‘Tour du Rwanda’ rigiye gukinwa ku nshuro ya 11.

Tour du Rwanda nicyo gikorwa cy’imikino cyonyine kigera mu Ntara zose z’u Rwanda kandi gikurikiranwa n’abanyarwanda benshi badasabwe ikiguzi na gito, muri make ni ku buntu.
